phrases.question: What is CampusBeacon?
phrases.answer: CampusBeacon is a comprehensive platform that connects campus communities with events, academic resources, forums, and more. We strive to make campus life easier and more engaging.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: what is campusbeacon?

phrases.question: How do I sign up for CampusBeacon?
phrases.answer: Signing up is quick and easy! Just click on 'Register' on our homepage, enter your email and password, and you're all set.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i sign up for campusbeacon?

phrases.question: What services does CampusBeacon offer?
phrases.answer: We offer real-time event updates, lost and found, buy and sell boards, academic collaboration tools, forums, and more. Check our site for a full list of features!
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: what services does campusbeacon offer?

phrases.question: How can I contact CampusBeacon support?
phrases.answer: For support, visit our 'Contact Us' page or send an email to campusbeacon0@gmail.com. We'll get back to you soon!
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i contact campusbeacon support?

phrases.question: Is my personal data safe on CampusBeacon?
phrases.answer: Yes, we employ industry-standard security measures to keep your data safe. Please see our Privacy Policy for more details.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: is my personal data safe on campusbeacon?

phrases.question: What campus events are coming up?
phrases.answer: Check out the dynamic events calendar on CampusBeacon to see what's happening. You can also filter by categories or dates.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: what campus events are coming up?

phrases.question: How do I find events on CampusBeacon?
phrases.answer: Just head to our 'Events' section. You can browse upcoming events by date, category, or campus location.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i find events on campusbeacon?

phrases.question: I need help
phrases.answer: Let me know what you need help with specifically, and I'll do my best to assist!
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: i need help

phrases.question: How can I access the hostel section?
phrases.answer: You can access the hostel section by clicking on the 'Hostel' button in the navbar. There, you can check hostel details, officials, and other features.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i access the hostel section?

phrases.question: How can I submit a complaint about hostel issues?
phrases.answer: To submit a complaint, go to the hostel section and find the 'Complaint Box'. You can enter your issue, and the hostel administration will review it.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i submit a complaint about hostel issues?

phrases.question: Where can I see hostel notifications?
phrases.answer: You can check hostel-related notifications in the 'Notification Box' inside the hostel section. Admins post important updates there.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: where can i see hostel notifications?

phrases.question: How can I view hostel officials?
phrases.answer: You can find the list of hostel officials in the 'Hostel Officials' section. It includes details like their name, position, and contact info.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i view hostel officials?

phrases.question: How can I check my attendance?
phrases.answer: Your attendance records are available in the 'Attendance' section. It shows your subject-wise attendance percentage.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i check my attendance?

phrases.question: How can I access study materials?
phrases.answer: You can find study materials, PDFs, and images categorized by branches and semesters in the 'Resource Hub' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i access study materials?

phrases.question: How can I buy an item from another student?
phrases.answer: Go to the 'Buy & Sell' section to browse items listed by other students. You can contact the seller and negotiate the price.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i buy an item from another student?

phrases.question: How can I sell my items to other students?
phrases.answer: In the 'Buy & Sell' section, click on 'Sell an Item' and upload details about the product, including images, description, and price.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i sell my items to other students?

phrases.question: Where can I check the menu of canteens?
phrases.answer: You can check the menu of different canteens in the 'Eateries' section. It shows the available food items and their prices.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: where can i check the menu of canteens?

phrases.question: Can I rate the food in canteens?
phrases.answer: Yes, you can rate and review the food in the 'Eateries' section to help other students choose the best options.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: can i rate the food in canteens?

phrases.question: How can I take a ride?
phrases.answer: To take a ride, go to the 'Rides' section and check available rides. You can book a ride based on your destination and time preference.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i take a ride?

phrases.question: How can I share a ride?
phrases.answer: If you want to share a ride, go to the 'Rides' section and list your ride details, including start location, destination, and available seats.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i share a ride?

phrases.question: How can I view upcoming exams?
phrases.answer: You can check upcoming exams in the 'Exam Schedule' section, where dates and subjects are listed.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how can i view upcoming exams?

phrases.question: Can I view my class timetable?
phrases.answer: Yes, your class timetable is available in the 'Timetable' section under Resource Hub.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: can i view my class timetable?

phrases.question: How do I find past year question papers?
phrases.answer: Past year question papers are available in the 'Resource Hub' under the study materials section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i find past year question papers?

phrases.question: How do I contact hostel officials?
phrases.answer: Hostel officials' contact details are listed in the 'Hostel Officials' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i contact hostel officials?

phrases.question: Can I request maintenance for my hostel room?
phrases.answer: Yes, you can request maintenance by submitting a complaint in the 'Complaint Box' under the hostel section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: can i request maintenance for my hostel room?

phrases.question: How do I book a ride to the railway station?
phrases.answer: You can check for available rides in the 'Rides' section and book one that suits your schedule.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i book a ride to the railway station?

phrases.question: Can I list multiple items for sale?
phrases.answer: Yes, you can list multiple items in the 'Buy & Sell' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: can i list multiple items for sale?

phrases.question: How do I know if my attendance is below the required percentage?
phrases.answer: You will see a warning in the 'Attendance' section if your attendance is below the minimum percentage required.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i know if my attendance is below the required percentage?

phrases.question: Where can I download assignment PDFs?
phrases.answer: You can download assignment PDFs from the 'Resource Hub' under your branch and semester.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: where can i download assignment pdfs?

phrases.question: Can I search for specific food items in the eateries section?
phrases.answer: Yes, you can search for specific food items and their availability in the 'Eateries' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: can i search for specific food items in the eateries section?

phrases.question: How do I report a lost or found item?
phrases.answer: You can report lost and found items in the 'Lost & Found' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i report a lost or found item?

phrases.question: Is there a way to check hostel mess timings?
phrases.answer: Yes, you can check hostel mess timings in the 'Hostel' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: is there a way to check hostel mess timings?

phrases.question: Can I update my profile details?
phrases.answer: Yes, you can edit your profile details in the 'Profile' section.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: can i update my profile details?

phrases.question: How do I view my exam results?
phrases.answer: Your exam results are available in the 'Exam Results' section of the Resource Hub.
phrases.lowercaseQuestion: how do i view my exam results?
